imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.Utils

  • public abstract class Utils
extends Object
    This class defines static utility methods used by the Delaunay implementations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Utils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Point[] makeOuterTriangle(Collection<Point> points)
      Creates a 2D triangle that is sufficiently large to be used as an outer triangle for the Delaunay triangulation of the given point set.
      static Point[] makeOuterTriangle(double width, double height)
      Creates a 2D triangle that is sufficiently large to be used as an outer triangle for the Delaunay triangulation of points inside the given bounding rectangle, anchored at (0,0).
      static Point[] makeOuterTriangle(double xmin, double xmax, double ymin, double ymax)
      Creates a 2D triangle that is sufficiently large to be used as an outer triangle for the Delaunay triangulation of points inside the given bounding rectangle.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Utils

        public Utils()

    • Method Detail

      • makeOuterTriangle

        public static Point[] makeOuterTriangle(Collection<Point> points)
        Creates a 2D triangle that is sufficiently large to be used as an outer triangle for the Delaunay triangulation of the given point set.
        Parameters:
        points - the 2D point set
        Returns:
        a triangle as an array of 3 points

      • makeOuterTriangle

        public static Point[] makeOuterTriangle(double xmin,
                                        double xmax,
                                        double ymin,
                                        double ymax)
        Creates a 2D triangle that is sufficiently large to be used as an outer triangle for the Delaunay triangulation of points inside the given bounding rectangle.
        Parameters:
        xmin - minimum x-coordinate of the bounding rectangle
        xmax - maximum x-coordinate of the bounding rectangle
        ymin - minimum y-coordinate of the bounding rectangle
        ymax - maximum y-coordinate of the bounding rectangle
        Returns:
        a triangle as an array of 3 points

      • makeOuterTriangle

        public static Point[] makeOuterTriangle(double width,
                                        double height)
        Creates a 2D triangle that is sufficiently large to be used as an outer triangle for the Delaunay triangulation of points inside the given bounding rectangle, anchored at (0,0).
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the bounding rectangle
        height - the height of the bounding rectangle
        Returns:
        a triangle as an array of 3 points
